articles.title: Coach owner agrees $8.5bn deal to buy Versace parent - BBC
articles.description: Tapestry, which owns Coach, is creating a US luxury conglomerate in the same vein as France's giants.
articles.content:
The company that owns Versace is being bought by the luxury goods group Tapestry in a deal worth $8.5bn (£6.7bn).
